game.name: Obscurite Magie: The City of Sin
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A classic-style, turn-based RPG. After her precious family dagger is stolen, Louise tracks the thieves to the infamous town of Ruedidalia. But her situation becomes even more difficult when she is tasked with incredibly tough bounties.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A classic-style, turn-based RPG. After her precious family dagger is stolen, Louise tracks the thieves to the infamous town of Ruedidalia. But her situation becomes even more difficult when she is tasked with incredibly tough bounties.

reviewHighlights.text: 스탠딩 일러에 혹해서 샀더니 그게 전부인 게임. 스토리도, 인물 묘사도, 게임성도, 일러스트도 별로. 심지어 야겜에서 제일 중요한 성기 부분을 대충 그려놔서, 그렇게 야하지도 않음....
